# delegate

**Instance Property**

The split view’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSSplitViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Customizing the Split View Behavior

- **NSSplitViewDelegate**: A set of optional methods that a delegate of a split view implements.
